features: 👍7/8 Male to 7/8 Female, 6 inches long toilet hose extension to Toilet Seat. connect FEMALE SIDE to ballcock pipe of the toilet tank and MALE SIDE connects to either a T adapter of bidet/diaper sprayer or to an existing water supply toilet hose or to the electric bidet
👍 FEMALE SIDE to ballcock pipe of the toilet tank and MALE SIDE connects to either a T adapter of bidet/diaper sprayer or to an existing water supply toilet hose or to the electric bidet
👍UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY : Solid braided stainless steel extension fits most USA toilet model configurations with hard access or old toilet threads.

👍MULTIPLE USE CASES : Fit your toilet attachment (bidet sprayer , diaper sprayer T adapter and wash lets ) to the toilet flush tank...so its possible to use these accessories with SKIRTED DESIGN OF TOILET SEAT, concealed ballcock supply, cramped space or if the water supply was too far.

👍 QUICK AFTER-SERVICE REPLY : for any quality issues with the magnetic phone car mount, please text us...we provide 24h*7day customer service to solve any problem better. We refund you or replace the item for any reason.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Toilet Hose Extension 6” , 7/8 Male To 7/8 Female Inlet hose to install handheld bidet in hard access toilet seat...for easy installation also in other seats models. EASY INSTALLATION : No need for plumber ...female with plastic threads so the hose will be easy installed...Easy hand tight ...no leak thanks to a cone washer. NOW WE COULD INSTALL A BIDET ON THIS TOILET MODEL you could install a bidet now thanks to the 6 inches 7/8-7/8 extension hose. This extension will allow you to connect the handheld spray bidet Tee adaptor to toilet Tank with hard acces such as the TOTO medels. To use this connection with skirted design of toilet , when the space is too narrow to the wall or the connections are concealed . FLEXIBLE BRAIDED TO EASY INSTALLATION AND AVOID LEAKS ORIGINE MULTIPLE USE CASES - Fit your toilet attachment like bidet sprayer , diaper sprayer T adapter and wash lets properly to the toilet flush tank MUST HAVE TO GET BEST RESULT ON INSTALLING TOILET BIDETS PERFECT ACCESSORY - 7/8 male to 7/8 female toilet hose extension of 6 inches is a perfect accessory for Wash Lets models C110, E200, E50, S300 , S350e, S400 and many more if you have trouble connecting adapter or water hose to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a lifesaver for me so I could install bidet. It is very disappointing that Lowe’s and Home Depot do not carry it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After having to replace our toilet in our single-wide trailer, we quickly realized that the base models were too tall and the hose in the floor wouldn't reach. We bought this as a connector so we wouldn't have to replace the whole thing, and it worked GREAT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm!!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. 2nd one I got for an upgrade toilet install. Solved my problem for a short hook up line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed and was unable to find locally at any home improvement store.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these because I have the cheap Glacier Bay toilets and I bought the bidet toilet seat attachments off amazon, but the supplied hose to go to the inlet side on the toilet didn't have enough thread to made a good connection and would leak or not go on at all. These solved my issue! Upset I wasted my time trying to find a solution locally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well built but a little expensive extension hose!
reviews.reviewText: Replaced our toilet with a single piece unit that has very less rear space to fit in an extra bidet connection and hence got this extension. It worked well for my purpose & was easy to install as well. However, from my search in local stores and online, these are a little expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great as an extension.
reviews.reviewText: I used this product to extend from the current supply line to a new taller toilet and it worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little short but works great

reviews.reviewTitle: Hose is the real deal. No fuss, no leaks. Highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: My bathroom presented a challenge with a tight space behind the toilet tank, making it tricky to connect the bidet tee valve seamlessly. Got this hose as an extension to hook up my bidet to the toilet tank, and it's a lifesaver!📦 Loaded Package: They didn't skimp on goodies – 2 hoses, 2 extra washers, and a roll of plumbing tape. Check, check, check!💪 Built to Last: This thing feels like it means business. Sturdy and premium – no flimsy stuff here.💧 Leak-Proof: Zero leaks so far! It's doing its job without any unexpected surprises. Big check!💰 Affordable Awesomeness: Totally budget-friendly. Top-notch quality without breaking the bank.
Purchased this for a VOVO bidet seat to connect to toilet tank. It did the job well.
This is must-to-have if you are installing bidet system on a skirtd toilet. I searched for this piece in almost all of the stores and they didn’t have it.
